entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
